thread.title: Illinois guard Kendrick Nunn will have surgery on thumb
thread.title_full: Illinois guard Kendrick Nunn will have surgery on thumb

author: Sporting News
title: Illinois guard Kendrick Nunn will have surgery on thumb
text:
Illinois guard Kendrick Nunn will have surgery on thumb Sporting News 4 hrs ago Sporting News Â© Trevor Ruszkowski-USA TODAY Spor Jan 18, 2014; Champaign, IL, USA; Illinois Fighting Illini guard Kendrick Nunn (25) shoots the ball over Michigan State Spartans guard Alvin Ellis III (3) in the first half of the game at State Farm Center. The Michigan State Spartans beat the Illinois Fighting Illini 78-62. Mandatory Credit: Trevor Ruszkowski-USA TODAY Sports Illinois' injury-plagued basketball program absorbed another severe blow when it became clear junior guard Kendrick Nunn will require surgery on his thumb that will keep him out of action as the 2015-16 season begins.
AdChoices A source close to the Illini told Sporting News Nunn will miss as many as eight weeks.
MORE: Ranking college basketball's best transfers
Nunn is a versatile guard out of Chicago who averaged 11.1 points and 3.5 rebounds for the Illini last season.
He is expected to start at shooting guard when he recovers.
During the offseason, Illinois lost point guard Tracy Abrams with a season-ending injury for a second straight year.
